explains: vi. 编目录；按确定价格收入目录（等于 catalogue）
wordGroup: card catalog 图书馆里的卡片目录（等于card catalogue）

sentences.en: Let me look it up in the catalog.
Will you please send us your price list or catalog?
sentences.cn: 请把你们的价格表或目录寄给我们好吗？

sentences.en: He was always a scholar. His catalog of collectors' marks is still a classic.
sentences.cn: 他一直学识渊博。编纂的收藏家标记目录依然是经典。
